name: Goo
description: Goo, not to be confused with Afgoo, is an 80% indica strain that mixes a sweet-tasting Blueberry with the hashy, resinous Hindu Kush. Deep physical relaxation is coupled with slight cerebral energy, delivered alongside a fruity, blueberry flavor with earthy and sour notes. You may begin to feel pangs of hunger settle in with this indica, making it a suitable medicine for those needing appetite boost. Patients treating insomnia, pain, and muscle spasms may also find relief in the heavy, sedating effects Goo has to offer. Cultivators should harvest Goo after a 7 to 8 week flowering time indoors or in early October for outdoor gardens.
attributes_title: Sleepy, Relaxed, Hungry, Euphoric, Happy, Pain, Stress, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Muscle Spasms, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Headache, Paranoid, Dizzy
